description.value:
Requirements You have an enemy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained].

You thrash your foe around. An enemy you have grabbed or restrained takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier plus your weapon specialization damage plus your Rage damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC.
